afghanistan.notes: Due to safety concerns, Australian government advises its citizens not to visit Afghanistan.

angola.notes:
Visitors who have been granted an online pre-visa are then issued with a visa on arrival at Luanda International Airport.
For a maximum total stay of 90 days within a one year period.

austria.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area regardless of previous time spent in other Schengen countries

bangladesh.notes: Not available at all entry points.

belarus.notes: Must arrive and depart via Minsk International Airport.

belgium.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area. Additionally bilateral agreement permits 2 months on top of this.

benin.notes: Must have an international vaccination certificate.

bhutan.notes: Visa approved via tour operators only.

burundi.notes: Due to safety concerns, Australian government advises its citizens not to visit Burundi.

canada.notes: eTA required if arriving by air.

cape_verde.notes: Not available at all entry points.

central_african_republic.notes: Due to safety concerns, Australian government advises its citizens not to visit Central African Republic.

chile.notes: Australian tourists entering Chile through Santiago International Airport are required to pay a "reciprocity fee" of US$117.

china.notes:
72-hour visit without a visa when in transit at Changsha, Chengdu, Chongqing, Guangzhou, Guilin, Harbin, Kunming, Qingdao, Wuhan, Xi'an and Xiamen.144-hours visit without a visa when in transit through Beijing Capital International Airport, Dalian, Hangzhou, Shijiazhuang Zhengding International Airport in Hebei, Nanjing, Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport and Shanghai Pudong International Airport, Shanghai Railway Station and the Port of Shanghai); Shenyang and Tianjin Binhai International Airport
Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan do count as third countries under the 72 and 144-hours visa-free visit transit policy.

colombia.notes: 90 days - extendable up to 180-days stay within a one-year period

republic_of_the_congo.notes: Visa and invitation letters approved via tour operators only.

democratic_republic_of_the_congo.notes: Visa not required for Congolese-born visitors

côte_d'ivoire.notes: eVisa holders must arrive via Port Bouet Airport.

cuba.notes: Visitors travelling to Cuba can purchase a tourist card at the Cuban embassy or nearest travel agent that sells authorized cards.

czech_republic.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area

denmark.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area regardless of previous time spent in other Schengen countries (except the other Nordic countries)

eritrea.notes: A tourist visa for Australian citizens is issued for a stay of 1 month from arrival to Eritrea.

estonia.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area

ethiopia.notes: Not available at all entry points.

finland.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area regardless of previous time spent in other Schengen countries

france.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area (in Regions of France) regardless of previous time spent in other Schengen countries

gabon.notes: Electronic visa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.

germany.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period regardless of previous time spent in Schengen countries

greece.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area

hungary.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area

iceland.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area regardless of previous time spent in other Schengen countries

india.notes:
e-Visa holders must arrive via 25 designated airports[Note 1] or 3 designated seaports.[Note 2]
An Indian e-Tourist Visa can only be obtained twice in one calendar year.

iraq.notes: Due to safety concerns, Australian government advises its citizens not to visit Iraq.

italy.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area regardless of previous time spent in other Schengen countries

jordan.notes:
Conditions apply.
Not available at all entry points.

kyrgyzstan.notes: A single or multiple tourist or business e-visa for 90 days is also available.

laos.notes:
Conditions apply.
Available at international airports Luangphabang, Pakse, Savannakhet and Vientiane, and at 4 land borders Friendship Bridge,[Note 3] and at 13 border crossings[Note 4] as well as Tanalaeng train station in Vientiane, which connects to the train station in Nongkai, Thailand.
Entry points Lalai, Lantui, Meuang mom, Pakxan, and Phoudou are open only to visa holders.
Extendable up to 60 days.

latvia.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area

lebanon.notes:
Visa extendible for 2 additional months
Granted free of charge at Beirut International Airport or any other port of entry if there is no Israeli visa or seal, holding a telephone number, an address in Lebanon, and a non refundable return or circle trip ticket.

libya.notes: Due to safety concerns, Australian government advises its citizens not to visit Libya.

liechtenstein.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area

lithuania.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area

luxembourg.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area regardless of previous time spent in other Schengen countries

malta.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area

mongolia.notes: Registration upon arrival for stays longer than 30 days is mandatory.

myanmar.notes: eVisa holders must arrive via Yangon, Nay Pyi Taw or Mandalay airports.

nauru.notes: Criminal record and medical fitness certificates are not required for Australian citizens.

netherlands.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area (European Netherlands) regardless of previous time spent in other Schengen countries

nigeria.notes: Visa not required for Nigerian-born citizens.

norway.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area regardless of previous time spent in other Schengen countries (except other Nordic countries)

pakistan.notes:
Visa on arrival when travelling on business valid for 30 days.
Conditions apply.

papua_new_guinea.notes: Available at Gurney Airport (Alotau), Mount Hagen Airport, Port Moresby Airport and Tokua Airport (Rabaul).

paraguay.notes:
Only available at Silvio Pettirossi International Airport in Luque.
Reciprocity fee applies.

poland.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area

portugal.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area

qatar.notes:
Available at Hamad International Airport.
eVisa is also available.

slovakia.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area

slovenia.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area

somalia.notes: Due to safety concerns, Australian government advises its citizens not to visit Somalia.

south_sudan.notes: Due to safety concerns, Australian government advises its citizens not to visit South Sudan.

spain.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area regardless of previous time spent in other Schengen countries

sudan.notes: Visa not required for Sudanese-born citizens.

suriname.notes: Visitors arriving from Australia without a representation from Suriname can obtain a visa on arrival with a maximum stay of 2 months if holding a pre-arranged approval.

sweden.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area regardless of previous time spent in other Schengen countries (except other Nordic countries)

switzerland.notes: 90 days within any 180 day period in the Schengen Area

syria.notes: Due to safety concerns, Australian government advises its citizens not to visit Syria.

tajikistan.notes:
At Dushanbe International Airport.
Visa also available online.
E-visa holders can enter through all border points.

thailand.notes: Maximum two visits annually if not arriving by air.

timor-leste.notes: Not available at all entry points.

turkey.notes:
Cruise ship passengers do not require a visa for up to 72 hours.
eVisa can be obtained on arrival for a higher fee.

uganda.notes:
Determined at the port of entry.
May apply online.

ukraine.notes: Visa on arrival for business or tourism purposes, available at Kyiv Boryspil Airport, Kyiv International Airport (Zhuliany) and Odessa International Airport.

united_states.notes:
On arrival from overseas; ESTA (valid for 2 years when issued) required if arriving by air or cruise ship.
ESTA is not required for Guam and Northern Mariana Islands.

uzbekistan.notes: 5-day visa free transit when in transit at the international airports on condition of holding a confirmed onward ticket for a flight to a third country.

yemen.notes: Due to safety concerns, Australian government advises its citizens not to visit Yemen.

zambia.notes: Also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zimbabwe. eVisa available.

zimbabwe.notes:
Strictly tourism purposes only.
Also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zambia. eVisa available.
